Text:
Forgot to add:

Dear LucyWoof, please do not forget to (initially) seed yourself, otherwise noone will get your upload down! Thanks anyway.
Same seems to apply to your later opera upload Porgy & Bess!

Oops... Thanks for the reminder. I did forget and just force start both at high bandwidth. I didn't use initial seed because my bandwidth did not like it and I found it difficult to control. I do not  know much about torrent'ing,...yet.
